output.sentences: I am not sure how the tradition of having a Halloween parade in our town came to me.
Some of the costumes are grotesque and scary.
Others seem to represent pagan symbolism
I have no idea what that was that just went down the street in a wagon.
But all is not lost--some of the costumes were really quite whimsical.
